1.name: voc_undertale
1.response: Check out all the vocab files for Undertale: https://drive.google.com/open?id=18QjNZIld2_yZcHH1_g6EnPG7ML9NdNgZ

3.name: kana
3.response: I highly recommend this video to learn the Kana: https://youtu.be/_wZHqOghvSs Also check out these links for Kana https://www.tofugu.com/japanese/learn-hiragana/ and https://www.tofugu.com/japanese/learn-katakana/

4.name: reading
4.response: Check out this article for reading materials at every level: https://teamjapanese.com/free-websites-japanese-reading-practice-every-level/

5.name: anki
5.response: Anki is a SRS (Spaced Repetition System) App for PC/iOS/Android that will help you learn vocab. It's highly customizable. Check out: https://apps.ankiweb.net/

6.name: voc_nino
6.response: Check the vocab list for Ni no Kuni here: https://jisho.hlorenzi.com/list/-RdTuL

7.name: handwrite
7.response: If really want to improve your handwriting of Kana, check out this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yx4AGDXfwGE

8.name: jisho
8.response: I use Lorenzi's dictionary. You can find it here: https://jisho.hlorenzi.com/

9.name: guides
9.response: Learn Grammar with these guides. Tae Kim: http://www.guidetojapanese.org/learn/grammar Imabi: https://www.imabi.net/ Wasabi: https://www.wasabi-jpn.com/japanese-grammar/wasabis-online-japanese-grammar-reference/

13.response: Find the vocab list for Ace Attorney here: https://jisho.hlorenzi.com/list/rkE43D

15.name: run
15.response: Whips; No spell; No Master key; Knight; Fire Wpns; Max SL30

16.response: Stay hydrated everyone! 飲みましょう！
